ggalluvial
  • Get Started
  • Reference

Deprecated functions

These functions are deprecated in the current version and will be removed for the eventual CRAN release.

ggalluvial(...)

ggalluvial_lodes(..., incl.strata = TRUE, incl.labels = FALSE)

ggalluvial_alluvia(..., incl.strata = TRUE, incl.labels = FALSE)

ggalluvial_formula(formula, data = NULL, weight, incl.strata = TRUE,
  incl.labels = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed to ggplot and inherited by geom_alluvium and geom_stratum.
incl.strata

Logical; whether to plot strata over alluvia.
incl.labels

Logical; whether to plot labels over strata.
formula

A formula to specify the axes and alluvial divisions.
data

A data frame or frequency table.
weight

A weight variable, from data or of compatible length with the elements of formula.

See also

stat_stratum, stat_flow, stat_alluvium, geom_stratum, geom_lode, geom_flow, and geom_alluvium.
